website_summaries.verdict: The majority of the users commented that the Under Armour Speed Swift 2 is a breathable and comfortable shoe. They were happy with its perfect fit and lightweight structure. They loved wearing the product not only for short and long-distance running and walking activities but also for basketball and gym workout sessions. Although several of them stated that it was not supportive or durable, others still recommended the product because of its attractive appearance, fashionable design, good cushioning, and excellent performance.
pros: Some of the runners commented that the Under Armour Speed Swift 2 had an affordable price
Some reviews mentioned that it has excellent cushioning
A handful of consumers agreed that the shoe has good quality
A lot of users observed that the fit was perfect for them
Several purchasers commented that it performed well on different running activities
A good number of reviewers said that the shoe was comfortable and lightweight
Several wearers lauded the product's breathability
Some testers did not only recommend the Under Armour Speed Swift 2 for running and walking sessions, but also for basketball and workout activities
Based on some reviews, its design and appearance were attractive and stylish
cons: One of the users said that the Under Armour Speed Swift 2 was not supportive
The sole fell-off easily after several uses only, according to a purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Love my new shoes!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I buy size 11 in Under Armour shoes, and often size 10 in other brands. That being said these shoes are great and get 5 stars from me. I don't exactly 'run' , but I do walk faster than most people can jog and these shoes put some extra pep in my step. Like they propel you with you with each step. Very satisfied, and I love the light/dark grey contrast with a smig of purple, these shoes look sharp!!!
customer_reviews.author: Raylie Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: THEY are knock off UA, not legit- Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: I tried this shoe on in the store. They didn't have the correct size so I purchased online. I am seriously questioning if they are legit Under Armour. There are differences in the materials of the body of the shoe. The specks are in the front are just painted on rubber....the ones in the store were not just painted rubber... it was black fabric with pink fabric showing thru the slit design. Pretty not impressed. The heels are really rigid on these fakes too, not all fabric like the real ones.
customer_reviews.author: jaime

customer_reviews.title: Gray and orange is more neon than picture
customer_reviews.text: The orange laces are much more neon than pictured which I loved! I am usually an 8.5 in running shoes and these fit true to size. They were very comfortable until I ran in them and they left HUGE blisters on my big toes from where the seam also rubs against my foot. They did not offer much cushioning and gave me terrible shin splits too. Really wanted to love these but unfortunately they are going back.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Fits smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: I had tried a pair of these shoes on in a store in my usual size, but they were just a wee bit too snug, so I ordered a 1/2 size up, thinking they would be perfect. Nope, still snug. I should've exchanged them for another 1/2 size up, but I didn't because I never return ordered items. I know, my bad.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: Good value. One of my eyelets broke not long after i received them. Still wearing them though so for the price I really shouldn’t have a complaint
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Had to exchange the size.
customer_reviews.text: I had to return the shoe after ordering the wrong size. This was a gift and not sure of the size. The exchange process was so smooth. I received my exchange product and was allowed a 30 day period to return my wrong size. I have no concerns and the product is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable versatile shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is a really comfortable shoe for my wide feet for knocking around, and light training. The color is simple and sharp and goes with a lot of other things. I recommend for everything but medium-high impact cardio.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Walker

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These were my first under armour shoes purchased and I could not be happier. They look very stylish and they are very comfortable. I initially bought them for my workouts only, but now I wear them everywhere. I have received many compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: A. Daunyte

customer_reviews.title: Better than Nike
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Look great in person. I personally prefer under armour brand sneakers to Nike as I find they are more durable and provide better support. These sneakers lived up to many others I have bought of the same brand.
customer_reviews.author: HaileyyMariee

customer_reviews.title: 5 and it fit very comfortably so I decided to get another pair in a ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the same shoe a month ago at size 9.5 and it fit very comfortably so I decided to get another pair in a different color. Right when I put it on I could tell it was too small so I check to make sure it was the same size 9.5 and it was. Disappointed because I consider under armor shoes the best quality of shoes. When I order the same shoes in the same size I expect it do fit as the other shoe did
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Size runs a little small.
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my wife. She loves them. She wears a size 8. With socks it’s a tad tight. Probobly will stretch a bit as she breaks it in.
customer_reviews.author: UrbanTurbin

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe. I love this shoe and will be buying another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Blodgett Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite shoes! I have not been able to get these in stores. The price is comparable to the store I bought my original pair in.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Holland

customer_reviews.title: Heel pain!
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of these shoes but they are so uncomfortable! My heel was starting to hurt after just a short while wearing them. After an hour I was also having pain across the top of my foot. Not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Shoe feels different
customer_reviews.text: The ones I went out and bought from the store were more comfy. These shoes hurt my feet. Not sure why because they are the same shoe. Maybe different makers.
customer_reviews.author: Joni Vittitow

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were ordered for my wife. This is her third pair and she loves them
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Holland

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I’m glad these came so quickly! I can’t wait to break them in so I can wear them to Disneyland in a month! Thank you again. 👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: Viv93

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I am constantly on my feet all day for work. Most comfortable shoes I have had to date. Purchase a pair about every 6 months (work is harsh on my shoes)
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but a tad narrow
customer_reviews.text: Fit good just a tad narrower than expected. Comfy otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Gotdiesel2007

customer_reviews.title: D width is not a d width. This sneaker is not made in D widths, typo on seller's part
customer_reviews.text: Selected 9 C/D width, received and they are regular width, returned. Too narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Noodles

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Overall comfortable and cute. No arch support, so better as athleisure than running shoes for me.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: They were small for the size, Gave them to my daughter, and ordered another pair, half size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these shoes! Such vibrant colors and fit is prefect. I usually wear a 9.5 but ordered in 10 in athelic shoes and these were prefect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: fit and feels great. light weight
customer_reviews.text: fit and feels great. light weight. I am a nurse and I wear them for 12+ hours and I love them. will definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are honestly some of the most comfortable athletic shoes I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: These are honestly some of the most comfortable athletic shoes I have ever owned, and literally a third the price of Nike! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole F

customer_reviews.title: UA is a good brand. I use to have pains in my ...
customer_reviews.text: UA is a good brand. I use to have pains in my feet from my skate shoes but I switched to these and my arch isn't hurting or any pain.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Perez

customer_reviews.title: Great color!
customer_reviews.text: Great color! Guys a 1/2 size smaller than my normal shoe size but I just love these!
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: Good Under Pressure
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight and comfortable fit. They hold up in HIIT training which is what I was looking for. Other shoes slip around too easily. Plus, these are really pretty!
customer_reviews.author: Lita Wright

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoes! Looks very good and are very confortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: AAA+
customer_reviews.text: Wife is completely satisfied with the product and the price.
customer_reviews.author: Justin L

customer_reviews.title: Defective inventory
customer_reviews.text: Both sets that I bought have defects that make them completely uncomfortable to wear. I’ve worn this style for a while but this is a first
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Howard

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: I'm a fan of the brand. True to size. Comfortable to wear for a 12 hour shift.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Jo

customer_reviews.title: great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes. The extra wide sole helps for any lateral moves.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them! Fit is well
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Fit is well, i was a little worried they wouldnt fit since usually womans shoes fit a little more narrow...but these were great!
customer_reviews.author: Kayann

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I are UA fans, but she mentioned that this particular shoe was somewhat uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Alvaro Juliao

customer_reviews.title: Small toe box
customer_reviews.text: Liked these but too small in the toe box for a wider foot.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Felton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable durable couldn't be more happier...this is my second purchase of these shoes. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: LORI AARTS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Never really like under armour shoes, but I absolutely love these!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely loving these shoes i work on my feet and they were swollen and red when i got home so i ordered these and my feet feel sooooo much better
customer_reviews.author: Zippy

product_meta.title: Under Armour Women's Speed Swift 2 Running Shoes
product_meta.description: Lightweight, breathable mesh delivers increased ventilation with bonded film at midfoot for increased durability . EVA sockliner for added underfoot comfort. One-piece EVA foam midsole for a lightweight, responsive ride. Solid rubber outsole covers high impact zones for greater durability with less weight. Offset: 6 mm. Weight: 7.4 oz.
feature_bullets: NEUTRAL: For runners who need a balance of flexibility & cushioning
Lightweight, breathable mesh delivers increased ventilation with bonded film at midfoot for increased durability
EVA sockliner for added underfoot comfort
One piece EVA foam midsole for a lightweight, responsive ride
Solid rubber outsole covers high impact zones for greater durability with less weight
